it.polimi.deib.p2pchat.discovery.services

Class WiFiServicesAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<WiFiServicesAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • it.polimi.deib.p2pchat.discovery.services.WiFiServicesAdapter

  • public class WiFiServicesAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<WiFiServicesAdapter.ViewHolder>
    Class WiFiServicesAdapter with the new RecyclerView (Lollipop) and WiFiServicesAdapter.ViewHolder for performance reasons. This class is the Adapter to represents data inside the WiFiP2pServicesFragment

    Created by Stefano Cappa on 10/02/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  WiFiServicesAdapter.ItemClickListener
      WiFiP2pServicesFragment implements this interface
      static class  WiFiServicesAdapter.ViewHolder
      The ViewHolder of this Adapter, useful to store e recycle element for performance reasons.
